name: Introduction to Creative Writing
description: This course provides an introduction to the craft of Creative Writing. Students will learn how to use language in an effective and creative way while exploring a variety of topics and genres.

name: Storytelling
description: This course provides an introduction to the craft of storytelling. Students will learn how to craft compelling stories while exploring a variety of topics and genres.

name: Screenwriting
description: This course provides an introduction to the craft of screenwriting. Students will learn how to write scripts for film and television while exploring a variety of topics and genres.

name: Advanced Screenwriting
description: This course provides an in-depth look at the craft of screenwriting. Students will learn how to write scripts for film and television while exploring a variety of topics and genres.
